title: A new way of camera movement
body:
This is a thought ive just had, its about how in unlocked screen you can hold space bar to get the camera locked onto your champion while holding it. My idea is pretty much the opposite so when you're in locked screen you can hold space and it unlocks your screen while you hold space bar, personally i thought this was a great idea as someone who plays on a locked screen, y'all might think otherwise but this is my idea. Oh and it would be a setting in the esc menu so if people dont like it they can easily disable it. :D


Also, is there an actual way of like sending this into Riot?

replies.body: It would be good if they gave us that option in the controls.
playing with locked camera is just crippling yourself, learn to use space bar and free camera.
i use wasd to move camera around
